meanings.definition: A person who creates or initiates something.
meanings.sent1: The originator of the painting was a talented artist.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the originator of the popular dance move.
meanings.sent3: The originator of the new recipe accidentally added too much salt.
meanings.sent4: As the originator of the idea, he sparked a wave of creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The originator of the plan had a brilliant mind for innovation.

meanings.definition: The source or cause of something.
meanings.sent1: The originator of the rumor remains unknown.
meanings.sent2: The originator of the virus was traced back to a specific location.
meanings.sent3: The originator of the noise turned out to be a mischievous squirrel.
meanings.sent4: The originator of the problem was a simple misunderstanding.
meanings.sent5: The originator of the conflict was a misunderstanding that spiraled out of control.
